column3: News;Svay Rieng: 41 illegal fishing devices were confiscated and and owners contracted to stop using such tackle. According to the  police
column4: the crackdown against the use of the electrical devices took place on 7:30 am -3: 00 pm on September 10
column7: Svay Rieng.------Police said that before the crackdown and removal of the devices
column8: there were reports of villagers using electricity to catch fish in the local area.------The confiscated devices included 41 electro-stun rods. After some education and signing of a contract
column9: the cops released the people and allowed them to go home.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/702302.html
